author: felixk
msg: "In hadoop/hbase world, you set the conf properties by defining a *-site.xml where you override the default properties defined in *-default.xml which is shipped in the hadoop/hbase jar.
So rather than having hdfs-default.xml in our source tree, hdfs-site.xml with only dfs.datanode.data.dir.perm property defined will be better."

author: jvermillard
msg: nullable struture for socket configuration, null value means use default system configuration
